column4: morning,I have a fresh feisty install and OOO is borked - Impress can't go into slide show mode. Uninstalling openoffice.org doesn't seem to fix - can anyone offer suggestion of how to remove/reinstall/repair ooo?
Hiya how can I create the shortcut that allows me to type "oowriter" to the Run Application menu (ALT+F2) and have that launch openoffice.org2.2 -writer ?
